hints.content:
This circle is split into $3$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{thirds}$, with $1$ piece shaded.  

![A circle divided into 3 equal parts. One part is shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2399a356169c74b08bbcd4cb79135be0ea0c67b3)

This circle has one third of the shape shaded.

This circle is **not** split into $2$ equal-sized pieces. 

![A circle divided into 2 unequal parts. The small part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fbb319dc7922071bf0300147e0a48c717e22200a)

This circle is split into $2$ equal-sized pieces, or $\text{halves}$, with $1$ piece shaded.  

![A circle divided into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d58ae0ddc0beb799fe8936cc7e2eabd2afc23ca4)

The circle has one half of the shape shaded.

This circle has **one half** of the shape shaded:

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d58ae0ddc0beb799fe8936cc7e2eabd2afc23ca4)

question.content:
**Which circle shows one half of the shape shaded?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 3]]

choices.content: ![A circle divided into 3 equal parts. One part is shaded blue.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2399a356169c74b08bbcd4cb79135be0ea0c67b3)
![A circle divided into 2 equal parts. One part is shaded gold.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d58ae0ddc0beb799fe8936cc7e2eabd2afc23ca4)
![A circle divided into 2 unequal parts. The small part is shaded purple.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fbb319dc7922071bf0300147e0a48c717e22200a)
